content.question: Which of the following is true of the reaction system when <math alttext="0.64 gram" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.64</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math> of <math alttext="C a C 2, solid" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>CaC</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mi>s</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math> reacts?

choices.label: <math alttext="1.3 kilojoules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.3</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>kJ</mi></math> of energy is absorbed.
<math alttext="1.3 kilojules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.3</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>kJ</mi></math> of energy is released.
<math alttext="82 kilojoules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>82</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>kJ</mi></math> of energy is absorbed.
<math alttext="82 kilojoules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>82</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>kJ</mi></math> of energy is released.

content.answer: <math alttext="1.3 kilojules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.3</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>kJ</mi></math> of energy is released.

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
